name: Maintenance (Maxthedoom)
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 49.

You work as an IT guy/system administrator, and are tasked with ensuring all of the company computers are online. If you see one of them down, you need to investigate what's wrong with it and fix it. From time to time, you may also receive an email giving you tasks about the PC.

The whole system is so unstable, there's barely any downtime - or rather too much of it!

Especially considering problems arise more and more often the longer you go on.
